shortDescription.$: Small and powerful, the Lumia 635 is everything you need right in the palm of your hand. Equipped with Windows Phone 8.1, a highly advanced quad-core processor and the Windows personal voice assistant, Cortana, this phone lets you do it all.

Work or play, get it done in style with the LG G Stylo. This sleek smartphone comes with an embedded stylus for extra speed and accuracy on its enormous 5.7" high-definition IPS touchscreen. Combined with the power of Android™ 5.1, it's a serious device at an affordable price.

Meet the reimagined Samsung Galaxy S® 6. Featuring an incredibly fast octa-core processor, Android™ 5.1 and a 5.1" super AMOLED™ display, the Galaxy S 6 has it all. Its innovative dual-edge display features stunning metal and sophisticated glass - so it's got toughness as well as good looks.

Experience a crystal-clear display, powerful camera and stunning audio on the Sharp<sup class="rm">®</sup> AQUOS<sup class="rm">®</sup> Crystal. With an edgeless design that shimmers like an infinity pool in your hands, it's high end without the high price.

Optimum performance at an optimal price. Featuring a brilliant 4.5 touchscreen display, Corning® Gorilla® Glass protection, a 1.2 quad-core processor and a long-lasting battery, the Moto E delivers a fully loaded phone at an affordable price.

Power and speed are redefined with this sleek smartphone. The Volt™ runs the latest Android™ 4.4 (KitKat) operating system, the 1.2 GHz quad core processor makes it amazingly fast, and the 3000 mAh battery gives you up to 24 hours of talk time.

Browse the web, text, play music and share photos with the amazing value of the ONETOUCH Fling™. This small flip phone packs a 2MP camera for photos and video, an external screen with caller ID and big buttons.

Exciting features and a design that's out of this world. The Samsung Galaxy S<sup class="rm">®</sup> 4 features a Super AMOLED<sup class="rm">™</sup> display and a 13MP camera for stunning pictures and full HD video. Air View lets you navigate through your phone without actually touching the screen. And it all comes wrapped in Samsung's signature style.

Moto G is designed for all the things you want to do - taking and sharing photos, watching videos, checking scores, getting directions, listening to music, you name it.  This phone is smart and stylish, inside and out. Plus, get an extra 50GB of Google Drive storage for two years!†

A 5.5-inch Retina HD display. An A8 chip with 64-bit desktop-class architecture. 8MP iSight camera with Focus Pixels and optical image stabilization. Touch ID. Fast LTE and Wi-Fi.<sup>1</sup> Long battery life.<sup>2</sup> And iOS 9 and iCloud.

label.$: Dual Protection Black Cover - Kyocera Hydro Edge

body.$: Buy the LG G Stylo™ & get the LG Quick Circle Folio Case for FREE! $50 value!

legal.$: Free case with purchase is limited time only, while supplies last. Offer valid on boostmobile.com or orders placed via the phone from boostmobile.com.

shortDescription.$: Tackle your daily routine with the ALCATEL ONETOUCH Conquest. Certified water and dust resistant, this rugged Android™ phone is designed to withstand the toughest conditions. With a 5-inch, scratch-resistant HD screen and dual cameras, it's a feature-rich smartphone that's tough enough for real life.

shortDescription.$: A smartphone fast enough to keep up with you. The Boost Warp 4G boasts a 1.2 dual-core processor, 4G LTE and Android™ 4.1. Browse the Web, text, IM and email, all at warp speed.

Moto G is designed for all the things you want to do - taking and sharing photos, watching videos, checking scores, getting directions, listening to music, you name it.  This phone is smart and stylish, inside and out.

Expand your Universe. Loaded with access to 4G LTE speed †, dual cameras and super AMOLED™ touchscreen display, this Android-powered phone does it big. To top it off, the S Beam feature lets you share pics, music and videos by just tapping your phone to a friend's. Power. Simplicity. Sharing. The Samsung Galaxy S® III lets you have it all.

Power and speed are redefined with this sleek smartphone. The Volt™ runs the latest Android™ 4.4 (KitKat) operating system, the 1.2 GHz quad core processor makes it amazingly fast, and the 3000 mAh battery gives you up to 24 hours of talk time.
Slim, sleek and superpowered, the LG Venice rocks Android 4.1, epic entertainment features and a brilliantly durable 4.3-inch screen for enjoying it all.
Have it all and get it fast with the Samsung Galaxy Rush. Android 4.1 and Google Play™ make customizing a snap. With a big touchscreen and front-facing camera, this phone busts boundaries.

4-inch Retina display. A6 chip. 8MP iSight camera. FaceTime camera. LTE and Wi-Fi.¹ And iOS 9 and iCloud. iPhone 5c is engineered to the brightest specifications, comes in five colors, and is an eye-catching value.

Pack a premium punch with the LG Optimus F7™ Android™-powered phone. Stacked with a 4.7-inch true HD IPS touchscreen, dual cameras, a 1.5 GHz dual-core processor and access to 4G LTE speed (where available), this smartphone is sleek and powerful, so you can multitask and be entertained. Create. Share. Inspire.

Make the most of your mobile experience with the sleek and powerful ZTE Warp Sequent. A huge touchscreen and a 1.4GHz processor means you can multitask with style: web surf, watch high-def videos, access over 600,000 apps in the Google Play Store, plus much more.

Ultra features, ultra value. The phone you desire and your friends will envy. Equipped with the latest Android™ 4.4 (KitKat) OS, a 4.7-inch touchscreen display, and quad-core processor, the HTC Desire 510 streams video and music beautifully.

Browse the web, text, play music and share photos with the amazing value of the ONETOUCH Fling™. This small flip phone packs a 2MP camera for photos and video, an external screen with caller ID and big buttons.

Live on the Edge. This waterproof Android™ phone will protect your conversations - even through splashes and spills. The Hydro EDGE features an impact-resistant touchscreen and Smart Sonic™ sound technology, which improves audio outdoors or in other noisy places.

Conquer life's everyday adventures with the Samsung Galaxy Prevail 2. Set everything up the way you want it thanks to Android™ 4.1 Jelly Bean and a 1.4 GHz processor. Dual cameras and a 4-inch screen make it a cinch to chat face-to-face and share your can't-miss photos and videos.

The HTC One® SV gives you Beats Audio™ and screamin' 4G LTE speed. It also rocks dual cameras so you can score the perfect shot in a snap and a brilliant 4.3-inch screen so you can see the big picture. Surf the Web, catch up with your peeps and download Google Play™ apps with speed that will leave you breathless.

The LG Tribute™ features everything savvy surfers and social bugs crave, like a 4.5" touchscreen display, a 1.2 GHz Quad-Core Processor and an Android 4.4.2 KitKat Operating System. And keep on smiling, because with its 5.0 MP rear camera as well as a selfie-friendly, front-facing camera, you can click a perfect pic from any angle.
